recipesJson.name: Marcie - Peppermint Patty Clone
recipesJson.author: User 570
recipesJson.description:
Easily the best peppermint patty recipe! By reddit user discchord. 
Discchord states that it should steep for at least 3 days, but preferably for a week.

https://www.reddit.com/r/DIY_eJuice/comments/4d8f7b/marcie_easily_the_best_goddamn_peppermint_patty
